formattedAddress: 115 Dyckman St, New York, NY 10040, USA
adrFormatAddress: 115 Dyckman St, New York, NY 10040-1002, USA

originalText.text: Visited Tropical pets and was impressed by their excellent service and extensive range of products, including items for exotic species. Knowledgeable staff made the experience even better. Highly recommended for all pet owners!

text.text: Visited Tropical pets and was impressed by their excellent service and extensive range of products, including items for exotic species. Knowledgeable staff made the experience even better. Highly recommended for all pet owners!

originalText.text: Love this place. I recently moved to the Inwood area and I have been going here to get most of my pet supplies. I have 6 fish tanks and they are the joy of my life (don't tell my dogs that). The owner is super friendly and always ready to make suggestions to better my fishkeeping experience at home. Prices are fair and I never feel pushed to buy anything I don't need. See you guys later!

I‚Äôm so glad I stumbled on this place ü§©
I‚Äôve been meaning to add some fishies to my 15 gal tank and while walking a friend home I found this place! I added 2 Angel fish, 2 plecostomus and 4 colorful fishes which I‚Äôve forgotten the names. All my new fish are happy and are getting along with our betta and 2 mystery snails üòÖ
Tropical Pets Dyckman has a really nice selection of fish,  the man who helped me was very knowledgable and friendly. I also picked up some dog treats! I usually go to petco but this will be my go to, small business‚Äô forever üôåüèª

originalText.text: Very OVERPRICED. I let them know I got a new pet and I feel like they used it as an advantage because I didn‚Äôt know anything about prices or things that I would use. However half of the things I purchased I did not use AT ALL. Not only that he put multiple food 4 types of food and out of two of the 4 types of the food I was given MULTIPLE of them and my pet dislikes those food but one. And now it was money wasted, food wasted, and certain items I got that I never got to use wasted. My total was almost $400 and I honestly feel very used bc it shouldn‚Äôt have been almost $400 and I should‚Äôve never gotten so many foods that I didn‚Äôt see the guy put in my bag either that I paid for!! I was also not shown the price of any of the items he just scanned them and told me the total.

originalText.text: Although Tropical Pets supplies for many different animal types and pet needs, I come here for my fish. The staff are extremely helpful, knowledgable, and respectful. If you have requests for something you‚Äôd like in stock for solely your own purchase, they are extremely willing to try their best to satisfy those wants, and get that for you in their upcoming stock. Their fish selection is quite large, as they have many fish that are able to suit different tank sizes (which you can buy as well) and have different aggression rates. They restock and get a new selection about every week. All fish are healthy.
